titles.title: Junior Duck Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2005
Junior Duck Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2005
Junior Duck Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2005
Junior Duck Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2005
A bill to reauthorize the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Star Print ordered on on the bill.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe under authority of the order of the Senate of 07/29/2005 without amendment. With written report No. 109-124.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 195.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries and Oceans.
Subcommittee on Fisheries and Oceans Discharged.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 109-246.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 136.

bill.summary: 10/7/2005--Reported to House without amendment. Junior Duck Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2005 - Reauthorizes the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994 through FY2010.
